org.net4care.storage

Interface XDSRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeObjectXDSAndObservationCache, MSCodeplexXDSAdapter, NullXDSRepository, SpyXDS, SQLiteXDSRepository

    public interface XDSRepository
    Interface to an XDS repository for storing HL7 documents.
    Author:
    Henrik Baerbak Christensen, Aarhus University

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Open database connection - must be invoked before any provideAndRegister or retrieve
      void disconnect()
      Close the connection to the database
      void provideAndRegisterDocument(RegistryEntry metadata, Document xmlDocument)
      Store and register a valid HL7 document in the XDS affinity domain.
      List<Document> retrieveDocumentSet(XDSQuery query)
      Retrieve XML documents from the XDS that satisfy the constraints set in the query expression
      List<String> retrieveDocumentSetAsXMLString(XDSQuery query)
      Retrieve XML documents (string encoded) from the XDS that satisfy the constraints set in the query expression
      void utterlyEmptyAllContentsOfTheDatabase()
      Clean the repository: Empty contents of all tables but keep the table structure.

    • Method Detail

      • provideAndRegisterDocument

        void provideAndRegisterDocument(RegistryEntry metadata,
                              Document xmlDocument)
                                throws Net4CareException
        Store and register a valid HL7 document in the XDS affinity domain.
        Parameters:
        the - metadata defining the XDS registry entry to serve for finding the HL7 document
        xmlDocument - a valid HL7 document in XML to store in the repository
        Throws:
        Net4CareException

      • retrieveDocumentSet

        List<Document> retrieveDocumentSet(XDSQuery query)
                                   throws Net4CareException
        Retrieve XML documents from the XDS that satisfy the constraints set in the query expression
        Parameters:
        query - an instance of a query template, see class XDSQuery and subclasses in the .queries package.
        Returns:
        a set of xml documents, each representing a PHMR document that satisfies the query
        Throws:
        Net4CareException

      • retrieveDocumentSetAsXMLString

        List<String> retrieveDocumentSetAsXMLString(XDSQuery query)
                                            throws Net4CareException
        Retrieve XML documents (string encoded) from the XDS that satisfy the constraints set in the query expression
        Parameters:
        query - an instance of a query template, see class XDSQuery and subclasses in the .queries package.
        Returns:
        a set of XML strings, each representing a HL7 XML document that satisfies the query
        Throws:
        Net4CareException

      • connect

        void connect()
             throws Net4CareException
        Open database connection - must be invoked before any provideAndRegister or retrieve
        Throws:
        Net4CareException

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
                throws Net4CareException
        Close the connection to the database
        Throws:
        Net4CareException

      • utterlyEmptyAllContentsOfTheDatabase

        void utterlyEmptyAllContentsOfTheDatabase()
                                          throws Net4CareException
        Clean the repository: Empty contents of all tables but keep the table structure. TODO: remove from the interface.
        Throws:
        Net4CareException
